content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetMetrics path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/metrics content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name startdate
desc the starting date to retrieve metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name enddate
desc the ending date to retrieve metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name granularity
in query
required false
desc an iso 8601 duration to roll up metrics by
schema
type str
default auto
name platforms
desc a commaseparated list of billing platforms to filter metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pops
desc a commaseparated list of stackpath point of presence location codes to filter metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
name billingregions
desc a commaseparated list of billing regions to filter metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
name sites
desc a commaseparated list of site ids to filter metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
name groupby
in query
required false
desc the field to group metrics by
schema
type str
default none
name sitetypefilter
in query
required false
desc the type of sites to retrieve metrics for
schema
type str
default all
sum get metrics
desc the last 24 hours of metrics are retrieved if the start and end dates are not provided
responses
200
cdngetmetricsresponse
type obj
series
type arr
getmetricsresponsemetricseries
type obj
props
type
type str
desc the type of data in the analytics set
key
type str
desc a graphable key for the type of data in the analytics set
metrics
type str
desc descriptions of the cdn metrics samples
samples
type arr
getmetricsresponsemetricsample
type obj
values
type arr
items
type num
format double
desc an individual data point
desc the data points associated with a series of metrics
desc the cdn metrics data points
desc a series of analytics data suitable for a graph
desc the requested cdn metrics
desc the response from a request to retrieve cdn metrics from a stack
title: 13_Metrics_GetMetrics_72.json
